```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)

scooby <- read_excel("scooby.xlsx")
```

## Revisiting Scooby

When looking at `setting_terrain` vs another variable, make sure you consider `NA`s. Let's consider that variable and `arrested`.

```{r}
sum(is.na(scooby$setting_terrain))

sum(is.na(scooby$arrested))
```
Why are there so many missing values for `arrested`? Let's look at those. 

```{r}
missing_arrested <- scooby %>% 
  filter(is.na(arrested))

```
